title: Taller de Te
description: A vegetarian/vegan tea room and salon. A quiet relaxed space with peace of mind created through the culture of tea and infusions. You can drink tea, buy tea, read, share, work, enjoy. Serves a large variety of teas and blends from around the world and baked goods. Ingredients are mostly organic and some are vegan. Many of the other ingredients used in the mixtures are grown in Colombia by communities and farmers in organic and traditional way. All mixes are made-in-house by hand. Uses no additives, preservatives or flavoring; simply just the pure natural aroma and bouquet of the flowers, fruits, herbs.
